Class OrderDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.petropavlovskaja.pharmacy.dao.OrderDAO
  • public class OrderDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for executing SQL queries to the database related to the order

      • createOrder

        public boolean createOrder​(Customer customer,
                           Order order,
                           java.util.Set<MedicineInOrder> medicineInOrderSet)
        The method creates record and modify tables in the database after purchasing medicines. It uses savepoint statement and consist methods: setOrder(Savepoint, Connection, PreparedStatement, Customer, Order), moveMedicineFromCartToOrder(Savepoint, Connection, PreparedStatement, int, Set), tieRecipe(Savepoint, Connection, PreparedStatement, int, Set, Set), getMedicineUpdateInfo(Set, int), updateMedicineAfterBuy(Savepoint, Connection, PreparedStatement, Set), updateAccountBalance(Savepoint, Connection, PreparedStatement, int, int), updateCartAfterBuy(Savepoint, Connection, PreparedStatement, Set)
        Parameters:
        customer - - customer
        order - - order
        medicineInOrderSet - - set of medicines in the order
        Returns:
        true if total update was successful

      • updateAccountBalance

        public boolean updateAccountBalance​(java.sql.Savepoint savepoint,
                                    java.sql.Connection conn,
                                    java.sql.PreparedStatement psAccount,
                                    int customerId,
                                    int balance)
        The method updates customer balance after purchased createOrder(Customer, Order, Set)
        Parameters:
        conn - - connection to the database
        savepoint - - save point statement
        psAccount - - prepared statement for execute SQL query
        customerId - - customer ID
        balance - - balance
        Returns:
        true if update was successful
